item.title: Tmux common commands
item.description: tmux kill-session # kill all sessions tmux ls # list all sessions To enable Iterm2 to access the clipboard General -> Selection -> Applications in terminal may access clipboard The common commands 11. Create a new session: tmux new-session or tmux new -s <session-name> 22. Detach from a session: Ctrl + b followed by d 33. Attach to a session: tmux attach-session or tmux attach -t <session-name> 44. Switch between sessions: Ctrl + b followed by ( 55.
